entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -30.0°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
